item.title: pumpkin pur√©e
item.description: Ingredients 6 cups broth 1/2 pound split pumpkin in pieces 2 tablespoons flour 1 tablespoon butter Directions Boil the pumpkin in the broth. Strain and mash the pumpkin, mix the flour with a little cold broth, add the butter and put on the fire, stirring constantly and add the rest of the broth. Season to taste and serve warm.
